all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Purge ye out the iniquity which is among you; sanctify yourselves before me;
Doctrine and Covenants 43:11
Quote of the Day
"As we return often to the Lord with full purpose of heart, we will in quietness and confidence come to know Him."
L. Todd Budge | 1 Oct 2024General Conference
